pr_title: [satel] Action for reading the event log added

timeline.bodyText: Please use a real name here
timeline.author: J-N-K
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -63,6 +67,71 @@
     private @Nullable ScheduledFuture<?> cacheExpirationJob;
     private Charset encoding = Charset.defaultCharset();
 
+    /**
+     * Represents single record of the event log.
+     *
+     * @author kgoworek

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/bundles/org.openhab.binding.satel/src/main/java/org/openhab/binding/satel/internal/handler/SatelEventLogHandler.java b/bundles/org.openhab.binding.satel/src/main/java/org/openhab/binding/satel/internal/handler/SatelEventLogHandler.java
index 8db14de770..210fa7c152 100644
--- a/bundles/org.openhab.binding.satel/src/main/java/org/openhab/binding/satel/internal/handler/SatelEventLogHandler.java
+++ b/bundles/org.openhab.binding.satel/src/main/java/org/openhab/binding/satel/internal/handler/SatelEventLogHandler.java

@@ -70,7 +70,7 @@ public class SatelEventLogHandler extends SatelThingHandler {
     /**
      * Represents single record of the event log.
      *
-     * @author kgoworek
+     * @author Krzysztof Goworek
      *
      */
     public static class EventLogEntry {

timeline.bodyText: The Optional was here before, so ok for me, but I think you gain nothing by using it here. A simple null-check would be sufficient (in fact you are not doing anything other than that here) and produce less overhead.
timeline.author: J-N-K

replies.bodyText: The method is used in other place as well (L205). Here, you're right, it does not make sense to use it.
replies.author: druciak

timeline.message:
